Text: RE DOT Interval Data Cc Bill Marie told me of your conversation last week regarding decision on moving vass too bad hope you guys can still deal with it internally Also just making sure that you had received this interval data for the DOT Roman Piaskoski Regional Energy Coordinator GSA New England Causeway Street Boston MA Forwarded by Roman J PiaskoskiPMFRGSAGOV on AM DeRusso Cynthia To Costa Thomas Cynthia staro nlinecom cc Bill Sullivan Email Roman Piaskoski PM Email Jerz Joseph Subject RE DOT Interval Data Thom Ive attached spreadsheets containing months of minute interval data for DOT account The period is from to If you have any questions please contact me Cynthia x ayxls byxls Original Message From Costa Thomas Sent July To DeRusso Cynthia Cc Bill Sullivan Email Roman Piaskoski Email Subject RE DOT Interval Data Cynthia Could you please provide minute interval data for account number I must have screwed up the original request and asked you for hour data I really need this today and it would be great if you could email it directly to Bill and Roman and copy me Thanks Thom PS I will be calling you shortly Original Message From Costa Thomas Sent Wednesday July PM To DeRusso Cynthia Subject RE DOT Interval Data Thanks Original Message From DeRusso Cynthia Sent Wednesday July PM To Costa Thomas Cc Milton John Jerz Joseph Subject DOT Interval Data Thom Ive attached spreadsheets containing months of hourly interval data for DOT account The period is from to Account number has contributors of interval data If you have any questions please contact me Cynthia x File yyxls File yyxls This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager See attached file ayxls See attached file byxls

RE wind power workshop Cc FYI guess I was missinformed Roman Piaskoski Regional Energy Coordinator GSA New England Causeway Street Boston MA Forwarded by Roman J PiaskoskiPMFRGSAGOV on AM Robert C To Grace cc eadva Subject RE wind power workshop ntagecom PM Please respond to bgrace Roman heres the list of up and running wind in the Northeast operating in New England very little to work with yet Searsburg VT owned by Green Mountain Power you should already have the contacts from EPA Chelmsford Princeton Municipal Light Plant small wind farm x kW turbines output of repowering of one of turbines already committed to a green retailer unlikely anything available but contact is Jon Fitch Endless Energy has put up two small turbines at customer locations in Maine used onsite Burlington VT Electric Department has a small kW turbine part of the generation mix of the utility not sure they would or could resell operating in NY Weathersfield project near Buffalo Ontario Power Generation has contractual control of the green attributes contact Murray Paterson Fenner Project near Syracuse developed by Atlantic Renewable Energy Corp owned by CHI energy contact Bill Moore at AREC Bill tlanticrenewablecom if you do please let him know I sent you Madison Project near Syracuse contact PGE National Energy Group either Muir Davis or Jane HotchkissGordy Under construction Hull Municipal Light Plant one kW turbine will be up by the end of Autumn Will be used to serve town load have not in the past shown interest in selling I know green marketers who have approached them and had no luck Has permits but not yet constructed Berkshire Wind Project western MA contact Dale Osborn DisGen a few other projects are currently seeking permits Let me know if you are interested Regards Bob Grace Sustainable Energy Advantage LLC Lodge Lane Natick MA fax mailto Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday September PM To Subject Re wind power workshop Bob I had not received this previously thanks for passing it on I am looking for some one or some company or corp who has up and running wind power I would like to connect them with our current generation provider any connections you could would want me to get them talking please let me know thanks again for passing this on Roman Piaskoski Regional Energy Coordinator GSA New England Causeway Street Boston MA Robert C To Paul King Grace Roman Piaskoski eadva Larry Union Bob Maddox ntagecom Sam Swanson Larry Chretien Erika Morgan AM Steve MacAusland Please respond Megan Amsler to bgrace cc Subject wind power workshop You all should have received an announcement for the upcoming wind workshops October and at the Boston Radisson I am just checking a sample to make sure that the email distribution of the attached announcement had worked properly Please let me know if you have not previously received this and sorry for any duplication Regards Bob Grace Sustainable Energy Advantage LLC Lodge Lane Natick MA fax mailto See attached file Save the Date Emailpdf

RE Wind FarmRich I saw Dale last Thursday at a wind conference here in Boston he is not up and running yet but needs to start selling power and told me he would call you only thing is I did not have access to your number at the time so I gave Dale Bills tel number Roman Piaskoski Regional Energy Coordinator GSA New England Causeway Street Boston MA Ring To Hatch Bill Bill NRONcom Richard RichardRing cc ENRONcom Subject RE Wind Farm PM Bill I already have the number for Mr Osburn Thanks Richard Original Message From Hatch Bill Sent Friday October PM To Cc Ring Richard Subject Wind Farm Roman I talked to Richard and he would be very interested in talking with Dale Osburn Can you send him the number Hope all is well Bill This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
